name: 眼中的世界 - Conviction
description:
Story:A forgotten lagend says"The man who is regonized by the Elf, could gain the power to change the world.."
Three years ago, Land of Elvis
became stronger and gradually on the verge of collapsed. Empire Abyss claimed to instructed to escape others countries for the righteousness.Features：SLG fight with big army, you can choose different mercenary fight for you.
Multiple ending. The end of story will change by player's selection.
Twelve main characters in this game. Fourty career to train your own character.
＃Demo version can experience two chapter. And can't use files with the
offical version.Few words from the development team :Conviction is still under development. We hope to learn more about the players' ideas and release the test version first. And will adjust the game according to the player's feedback.We also hope that the players who like this game can continue to support us. Thank you.
